item.title: MRK
item.description: score:30 Chances: Several big pharma companies are rushing into the GLP-1 obesity space, which currently has two market leaders, indicating potential growth opportunities for Merck’s obesity drugs. New drugs for obesity and cancer are the focus of many pharma companies, suggesting a growing market for Merck’s pharmaceutical and oncology products.
